title: Ticket #582: Add the Condor binaries to the PATH on Windows
description:
The current Windows installer does not add the Condor binaries to the PATH statement, so Condor commands need to be run with a full path.

Please add a step that gives the user the option to add the binaries to their path statement (this should be the default), the system path (i.e. for everyone--so call the option "for all users of this machine" and not "the system path") or to neither.

For consistency, use the "RunOrSubmitJobs" dialog in the condor.mm script as a template for the new options.
remarks:

In addition, the menu category could include links to condor_birdwatcher, to uninstall Condor, to open up the Condor Manual (perhaps via the installer laying down the version of the manual?), ....

Thoughts?
